Mojave desert

Defined by a combination of latitude, elevation, geology, and plants.

Mojave preserve camping

Nothing says hitting the wilderness like unfurling the canvass and hammering in the pegs.

Hike the Arch Rock nature trail

Coming with some astounding views, intriguing glimpses of Mojave Desert plants and wildlife, and tastes of the arid backcountry of SoCal.

Conquer the Kelso Dunes

This result is a row of summits that soar more than 200 meters, clad in tough grasses and natural ripples.

Drive the old route 66

The spirit of the Wild West continues with sightings of the colossal Kelso Dunes and the ochre-tinted Amboy Crater

Mojave preserve camping

Nothing says hitting the wilderness like unfurling the canvass and hammering in the pegs.

Hike the Arch Rock nature trail

Coming with some astounding views, intriguing glimpses of Mojave Desert plants and wildlife, and tastes of the arid backcountry of SoCal.

Conquer the Kelso Dunes

This result is a row of summits that soar more than 200 meters, clad in tough grasses and natural ripples.

Drive the old route 66

The spirit of the Wild West continues with sightings of the colossal Kelso Dunes and the ochre-tinted Amboy Crater

To enjoy a successful desert excursion, you must prepare yourself.

Water

Sunscreen

Sunglasses

Proper clothes

Hiking Boots

Multi-tools
